name: Hazy
author: spoony_b4rd
notes:
First time getting KoG with something other than CA 
Still toying with removing SRH/econ for another glory or tiger, they weren't all that useful. Occasionally bricked pretty hard but winrate was consistently good so was reluctant to change too much. Had a couple of very uncomfortable matches vs. Dark Magician and Straight to the Grave REZ for my last two but BR pulled me through.
